column2: At three minutes past two, the lights in the motel corridor flickered and went out, leaving the long hallway in relative darkness, the spill from the stairwell the only source of illumination.

Wake up.
"Having the worst dream."
"I should certainly say you were."
"It was awful. It just went on and on."
"I shook you and shook you and."
"Time is it."
"It's nearly - almost 2:04."
